entry.title: PPLNS with job declaration
entry.summary: The email content delves into the intricacies of how decision-making processes are handled within a specific mining pool context. It highlights the lack of direct communication mechanisms within the protocol for conveying decisions, emphasizing the static nature of such agreements. This scenario necessitates a prior consensus between the pool and its miners on how decisions are made and communicated. The information underscores the collaborative requirement in decision-making processes within mining pools, pointing out the inherent challenges due to the absence of dynamic communication channels in the protocol.
